title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 420.2 - Compliance with standard code
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 420.2 - Compliance with standard code

State Regulations

All steam distribution pipeline facilities shall be
designed, constructed, tested, operated and maintained, except as otherwise
provided in this Part, in accordance with "Power Piping, ASME B31.1-1989" (as
set forth in section
10.3
of this

Title.)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
420.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
